name: flash-fire

effect.sun-moon: will o wisp does not trigger this ability for Pokémon immune to burns.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: will o wisp does not trigger this ability for Pokémon immune to burns.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: will o wisp does not trigger this ability for Pokémon immune to burns.

short_effect: Protects against fire moves. Once one has been blocked, the Pokémon's own Fire moves inflict 1.5× damage until it leaves battle.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Powers up the Pokémon’s Fire-type moves if it’s hit by one.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Powers up the Pokémon’s Fire-type moves if it’s hit by one.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Powers up the Pokémon’s Fire-type moves if it’s hit by one.
